N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 9 ยง 7640.3 - General use of body imaging scanning equipment

State Regulations
(a) The
department shall ensure that the installation, registration, recordkeeping, maintenance, operation and inspection of any body imaging scanning equipment
utilized in a correctional facility shall comply with the regulatory
requirements promulgated by the Department of Health. (b) An individual who is pregnant shall not
be subject to body imaging scanning equipment at any time. (c) Procedures for identifying pregnant
individuals shall be implemented by the department, consistent with applicable

Department of Health regulations. (d) Body imaging scanning equipment may not
be used for medical examinations or to diagnose an illness or injury. (e) Absent exigent circumstances, all body
scans must be conducted by an officer of the same sex as the individual being
scanned. Individuals who are transgender or intersex may request that they be
scanned by an officer of a specific gender. Notes
